mcq.statement: Where is Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar, who assisted Quaid-e-Azam in preparing his 14 points, buried?
mcq.one_liner: Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar, who played a significant role in helping Quaid-e-Azam with his 14 points, is buried at **Bait-ul-Maqdis**.
